Commands.Angelo Cannon: 1-HIT BRV+HP attack.  Grants Angelo Recover for 3 turns.  Dispels Angel Wing.  While Angelo Recover is active:  - Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ (Angelo).  - Turns HP Attack to HP Attack+ (Angelo).  Angelo Recover regens HP and BRV.
Commands.HP Attack+ (Angelo): Raises BRV based on Max BRV before inflicting an HP attack.
Commands.Angel Wing: Triggers another turn instantly (no Action Delay).  Grants Angel Wing for 3 turns.  Dispels Angelo Recovery.  Doesn't increase the turn count.  While Angel Wing is active:  - Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ (Angel Wing).  - Turns HP Attack to HP Attack+ (Angel Wing).  - Tremendously raises Max BRV and Attack.  - Greatly lowers Defense.
Commands.Angel Wing Meteor: 3-HIT AoE BRV+HP Attack repeated 3 times.  BRV hits are dispersed if there is more than 1 target.  HP damage is equally divided among all targets.  Grants Angel Wing for 3 turns.  Dispels Angelo Recover.

Passives.Angelo Cannon Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Angelo Cannon.
Passives.Chase Bonus: Slightly raises BRV damage during a Chase Sequence.
Passives.Angel Wing Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn after using Angel Wing.
Passives.Critical Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with critical hits.
Passives.Angelo Cannon Charge: Increases Angelo Cannon's max uses by 1.
Passives.Tenacious Girl: Upon recovering HP, if the healing amount exceeds Max HP, the excess is converted to BRV.The BRV value granted is limited to 150% of Initial BRV.
Passives.Angel Wing Charge: Increases Angel Wing's max uses by 1.
Passives.Leader of the Forest Owls: Raises BRV damage dealt with BRV Attack+ (Angelo), BRV Attack+ (Angel Wing) and HP Attack+ (Angel Wing) by 10%.
Passives.Buff Attack&boost All: Slightly raises party's Max BRV and Attack while buffed.
Passives.Angelo Cannon Extend: Increases Angelo Cannon's max uses by 2.When using Angelo Cannon:- Increases the number of hits to 3.- Moderately raises its potency.- BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV.- Recovers HP based on HP damage dealt up to 20% Max HP.Slightly raises the potency of BRV Attack+ (Angelo).Slightly raises the BRV gain based on Max BRV when using HP Attack+ (Angelo).
Passives.Buff Boost&Speed Up: Moderately raises Max BRV and Speed while buffed.
Passives.Angel Wing Extend: When using Angel Wing:- Raises BRV based on Initial BRV.Tremendously raises the potency of BRV Attack+ (Angel Wing).When using HP Attack+ (Angel Wing):- Tremendously raises its potency.- BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV.

Weapons.Pinwheel CP: 15: Raises Angelo Cannon's potency.Improves the effects of Angelo Recover and extends its duration.Raises all party members' BRV based on Attack after using BRV Attack+ (Angelo).Raises the BRV gain based on Max BRV when using HP Attack+ (Angelo).
Weapons.Valkyrie CP: 35: When using Angel Wing:- Grants Small Max BRV Up and Small Attack Up for 8 turns.- Raises the potency of BRV Attack+ (Angel Wing).- Raises the potency of HP Attack+ (Angel Wing) and deals 50% damage to other enemies after using it.
Weapons.Rising Sun CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability Angel Wing Meteor.
